UserProfile.title: User Profile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user's profile information within the app.

photoURL.description: URL of the user's profile picture.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the user profile was created.

Assistant.title: Assistant
Assistant.description: Represents a WhatsApp bot assistant managed within the Hey Manito! application.

description.description: A description of the assistant's purpose.

image.description: URL of the assistant's profile image.

personality.description: The selected personality type for the bot.

customPrompt.description: A custom prompt defining the bot's behavior if personality is 'custom'.

ownerNotificationNumber.description: Phone number for sending notifications to the owner.

skills.description: A list of skills enabled for the assistant.

status.description: The current status of the assistant.

waId.description: The WhatsApp ID associated with this assistant.

verified.description: Whether the WhatsApp number is verified.

messagesUsed.description: Number of messages used in the current cycle.

messageLimit.description: The message limit for the current cycle.

createdAt.description: The date and time the assistant was created.

lastUpdate.description: The date and time the assistant was last updated.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores public-facing profile information for each user.

/users/{userId}/assistants/{assistantId}.description: Stores the assistants created by a specific user.
